Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2023 - Kernel Livepatch - ALAS2023LIVEPATCH-2025-038: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-6.1.124-134.200
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 - Kernel Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2024-50246:
	In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:

fs/ntfs3: Add rough attr alloc_size check

CVE-2024-36899:
	In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:

gpiolib: cdev: Fix use after free in lineinfo_changed_notify
